title: Rin’s Secret Special Training
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>When you said you “want to do a secret training”, I prepared a special triathlon plan, but the thought of it being a vocal training instead never crossed my mind<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin has enough stamina, you know! If we’re going to do a triathlon then Rin will already be good at it nya. Umm, Rin saw Kayochin doing a dance training with Eli-chan, so Rin wanted to do something too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eli and Hanayo did?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yeah. It’s probably for the pool-based live that Honoka-chan and Kayochin thought of, though….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I see…. So that’s what this is about. No, even so, that doesn’t explain why you would want to have a vocal training with me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eeh-! Rin loves your songs, Umi-chan! That’s why Rin wanted to train together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I-, is that so? You’re embarrassing me…. No, this is not the time for that! If that’s the case, then we’ll have to start the training over, Rin<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>If that’s what you think of me, Rin, then I need to come up with an even greater training program. Let’s reassemble the plan again!! I'm fired up now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Nyaa-! Rin is fired up too nyaa-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
